articles.title: Virginia Senate Backs Medicaid Expansion, Promising Health Coverage To Almost 400,000
articles.description: After six years, Virginia Democrats are about to get a health coverage expansion past the GOP majority.

articles.title: F.B.I. Official Wrote Secret Memo Fearing Trump Got a Cover Story for Comey Firing
